turns.utterance: I have recently been interested in hiking.  Do you have any experience hiking?
turns.response: I have some experience in hiking, a long and vigorous walk.

turns.utterance: Do I need to get special shoes?
turns.response: I would think you would want shoes to support you so you don't roll your ankle.

turns.utterance: Thats a good point.  I don't want to hurt myself!
turns.response: If you are looking for something to do on the weekend, a day hike would be good because you finish it in one day.

turns.utterance: Should I bring lots of water?
turns.response: It would depend on how far you are going as to how much water to bring.

turns.utterance: I think I will plan on a half day hike!
turns.response: There are so many health benefits to hiking, I think a half day hike would have some as well!

phrase: i am too old to hike i am in my seventies.
do you have any experience hiking?
